article.headline: McNeese State 49, Nicholls State 41
article.story: LAKE CHARLES, La. (AP) -- Greg Tucker and Edward Garriet each scored 14 points as McNeese State stretched it's winning streak to four straight games with a 81-64 victory over Nicholls State Friday night. McNeese (11-16, 7-9 Southland Conference) never trailed and held a 32-23 halftime lead. Eldridge Lewis scored 11 points for McNeese. Nicholls' Stefan Blaszczyski was the game's leading scorer with 21 points. Willie Depron scored 12 and Kieran Gleeson had 10. McNeese held a 38-30 rebounding edge led by seven from Jerrick Oliver. The Cowboys outshot Nicholls 55 percent to 37 percent.
